title: Salem Maritime National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        The Friendship of Salem is at dry dock in Gloucester  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, The Friendship of Salem is at dry dock in Gloucester   The Friendship of Salem is currently undergoing repairs and routine maintenance at dry dock in Gloucester, Massachusetts. We hope that the Friendship will return to Derby Wharf by November 2016.
